name: Cuphead: Pixel-Pressure
description:
Cuphead: Pixel-Pressure

This is of course just a Fan Game and was created within 5 days for the MFGG Winter Fangame Jam 2021.

I do not own copyright  any of the assets used in this game.

Story

After Cuphead defeated the Devil, he went back home to his Island. As he arrives he noticed the whole Island and even himself turned pixelated. Apperantly the Devil had prepared a Backup plan in case he loses. He pixelated the Island and told his footmen to go to Cupheads Home. And where is Mugman?

Controls

WASD = walk (Overworld)

AD = run left/right (level)

W = Aim up (level)

Space = Jump / Select

LMB = Shoot (hold)

Shift = lock

Esc = Close Window

Ctrl+M = change Username (for leaderboard)

Leaderboard

This game has a online Leaderboard. You will be prompted, to enter a username, when you first start the game. This is of course completely anonymous. In the game you will only see the top 10 times for each boss. Can you get on it? ;)

I also put together a small page where you can see the whole leaderboard

Credits

Special thanks to MDHR,
the creators of Cuphead for
making such a great game!

And also the guys at spriters-resource for ripping most of the game assets used in this game.
